response:
"datenprivatsphäre: warum gibt es immer noch unternehmen, die unsere persönlichen informationen sammeln und verwenden, ohne unsere zustimmung oder kenntnis? #datenschutz #privatsphäre #sicherheit"

translation: "data privacy: why are there still companies that collect and use our personal information without our consent or knowledge? #dataprotection #privacy #security"

this post critically examines the issue of data privacy and questions why companies are still able to collect and use personal information without proper consent or knowledge. the hashtags #datenschutz (data protection), #privatsphäre (privacy), and #sicherheit (security) are used to reach a wider audience and to categorize the post under these topics.
